titles.title: Jesus be the center of my life

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
// Jesus at the center of it all
Jesus at the center of it all
From beginning to the end
It will always be
It's always been You Jesus
Jesus. //

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nothing else matters
Nothing in this world will do
Jesus You're the center
And everything revolves around
Jesus You, are the center of it all

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
// Jesus at the center of my life
Jesus at the center of my life
From beginning to the end
It will always be
It's always been You Jesus
Jesus. //

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Nothing else matters
Nothing in this world will do
Jesus You're the center
And everything revolves around
Jesus You, are the center of it all

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Nothing else matters
Nothing in this world will do
Jesus You're the center
And everything revolves around
Jesus You, are the center of it all

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
From my heart to the heavens
Jesus be the center
It's all about You
Yes, it's all about You x3

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
// Jesus at the center of it all
Jesus at the center of it all
From beginning to the end
It will always be
It's always been You Jesus
Jesus. //
Jesus, You at the center of it all.
